Moon hags are powerful soothsayers who dwell in places where souls receive their final judgment. These vile creatures possess knowledge of—and perhaps some power over—the portals between the lands of the living and the dead, and innocent mortals sometimes seek them out for this reason. Moon hags use their knowledge to sow discord and place seeds of doubt in those who unwittingly seek their aid. Beings of great power can intimidate them into sharing the truth of what they know, but the cunning hags always try to hide some important piece of information or word things in such a way that anyone acting on their divinations still find their plans falling into ruin. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 29 **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 29 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 [Moon Hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1189) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 131 **Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +21, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +3 **Int** +5 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +3 **[Coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11)** A moon hag adds [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), and [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) to her coven's spells. --- **AC** 29 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +19 **Will** +22 **HP** 190 **Immunities** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) **[Ferocity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=16)**
**Moonlight's Kiss** A moon hag in an area illuminated by moonlight gains a +2 status bonus to AC and initiative rolls. In the light of a full moon, she is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32), and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d12+10 slashing **Occult Innate Spells** DC 29 - **5th** [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329) (×3), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Dreadful Prediction** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The moon hag howls a series of dreadful, apocalyptic predictions at a single creature within 30 feet, shattering its perceptions of reality. The target must succeed at a DC 29 Will save or become [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (stupefied 3 on a critical failure); regardless of the outcome, the creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. A creature that can see the moon takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against Dreadful Prediction. The stupefied condition from Dreadful Prediction persists until the curse is removed. **[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** claw
Hag Harbingers Moon hags serve the cosmic forces dedicated to the end of existence. On Golarion, they serve the god [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=38), the great, skull-faced moon hanging over [Pharasma's](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15). Moon hags in the Boneyard are empowered by him as they were bathed in the light of the full moon
